stories.Title: Bad news! The Starship launch is canceled
stories.Description: The highly-anticipated test flight of the Starship, SpaceX's largest and most powerful rocket, has been postponed due to a frozen valve, disappointing space enthusiasts around the world.
stories.Tweet: Bad news! The Starship launch is canceled 📦 The highly-anticipated test flight of the Starship, SpaceX's largest and most powerful rocket, has been postponed due to a frozen valve, disappointing space enthusiasts around the world. #spaceX https://www.npr.org/2023/04/17/1170355237/watch-live-spacex-launch-starship-rocket

stories.Title: Everything you need to know about Starship
stories.Description: Become a part of the hype surrounding SpaceX's most ambitious project by learning all the facts about the transport system that could take humans to Mars.

stories.Title: Google responds to the AI race with their new project, "Magi”
stories.Description: Following reports that Samsung was considering a switch to Bing as its default search engine, the company quickly decided to develop its own AI-powered search tools.
stories.Tweet: Google responds to the AI race with their new project, "Magi” 📦 Following reports that Samsung was considering a switch to Bing as its default search engine, the company quickly decided to develop its own AI-powered search tools. #google https://www.theverge.com/2023/4/17/23686108/google-ai-search-tools-magi-chatgpt-bing-samsung-deal

stories.Title: Sundar Pichai's perspective on the development of AI
stories.Description: As Google's CEO Sundar Pichai reflected on the development of AI, he discussed how ethics and philosophy were critical in ensuring its moral foundation.
stories.Tweet: Sundar Pichai's perspective on the development of AI 📦 As Google's CEO Sundar Pichai reflected on the development of AI, he discussed how ethics and philosophy were critical in ensuring its moral foundation. #ai https://www.businessinsider.com/google-sundar-pichai-generative-ai-ethicists-philosophers-chatgpt-bard-moral-2023-4

stories.Title: Elon Musk's new company is called X.AI
stories.Description: As a result of the recent recruitment of AI experts and rumors about the purchase of thousands of GPUs, business records now confirm Musk's commitment to AI.

stories.Title: Adobe welcomes Firefly
stories.Description: With this announcement, creatives can now access powerful AI tools at their fingertips, allowing them to edit videos and color grade by using just a few words.

stories.Title: Moderna's experimental cancer vaccine shows promising results
stories.Description: Combined with Merck's Keytruda, this experimental mRNA vaccine may reduce the risk of skin cancer recurrence.
stories.Tweet: Moderna's experimental cancer vaccine shows promising results 📦 Combined with Merck's Keytruda, this experimental mRNA vaccine may reduce the risk of skin cancer recurrence. #science https://www.cnbc.com/2023/04/16/moderna-cancer-vaccine-with-mercks-keytruda-delays-return-of-deadly-skin-cancer.html

stories.Title: Skywatchers get ready! A solar eclipse is coming
stories.Description: An unusual hybrid solar eclipse will take place on April 20th in the Southern Hemisphere, but don't worry, it will be live-streamed.

stories.Title: iOS 17 will allow users to sideload apps
stories.Description: Apple may finally put an end to its closed app distribution system, as reports suggest that an announcement related to sideloading might be made at the upcoming Worldwide Developer Conference.
stories.Tweet: iOS 17 will allow users to sideload apps 📦 Apple may finally put an end to its closed app distribution system, as reports suggest that an announcement related to sideloading might be made at the upcoming Worldwide Developer Conference. #apple https://techcrunch.com/2023/04/17/ios-17-will-reportedly-set-the-stage-for-sideloading-apps-on-iphone/

stories.Title: Controversy sparks at a prestigious photography competition
stories.Description: Photographer Boris Eldagsen proved that photography competitions are not yet ready for AI-generated images after his submission won first prize at the Sony World Photography Awards.
stories.Tweet: Controversy sparks at a prestigious photography competition 📦 Photographer Boris Eldagsen proved that photography competitions are not yet ready for AI-generated images after his submission won first prize at the Sony World Photography Awards. #ai https://www.engadget.com/german-artist-refuses-award-after-his-ai-image-wins-prestigious-photography-prize-071322551.html
